about_the_game:
The official artbook of Frail Hearts: Versicorae Domlion features 66 pages, containing all of the visual material created in order to build the mysterious World of Gris.

The book is divided between:
  • The 5 protagonists' story arcs, featuring supporting characters and visited locations.
  • Full design of the 22 monsters fought during the adventure and their tarot cards.
  • Collaborations with various artists and Kickstarter backers.

DLC features both English and Italian version.

To find the DLC on your PC after downloading go to:
Steam Library > Frail Hearts: Versicorae Domlion > Manage... > Browse local files
You can find DLC as PDF files in the root game folder.
